response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its worth to you, I propose a special introductory offer of $11,500 for this exceptional item. This price reflects not only the high quality and functionality of the product but also the unique opportunity for you to secure it at a favorable rate. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 11500}
